Topic.Title: Inventory Tab - defaults for Take & Drop

Posts.EditableText:
Is there a reason why the inventory tab shows "Object can be taken" unchecked but "Object can be dropped" is checked?

[attachment=0:239o0w7s]<!-- ia0 -->object_inventory.jpg<!-- ia0 -->[/attachment:239o0w7s]

Would it be better if both of these were checked as default or both unchecked?
Posts.HTML:
Is there a reason why the inventory tab shows "Object can be taken" unchecked but "Object can be dropped" is checked?



Would it be better if both of these were checked as default or both unchecked?

Posts.EditableText:
My assumption is that because the majority of objects would be scenery objects that you can't take, take is unchecked by default. If you can't take something in the first place then in most cases whether drop is set or not is irrelevant. So drop is checked by default because again in most cases, once you do set an object to be able to be taken you'll want it to be able to be dropped also.

Having said that, my OCD nature makes me uncheck the drop option each time so that they're both the same, despite how pointless it is.
